items.question: What types of videos can benefit from chapterization?
items.answer: Any long-form content such as online courses, webinars, conferences, or tutorials can leverage chapterization to enhance viewer experience and retention.

items.question: Can I customize chapter titles and descriptions?
items.answer: Yes! You have full control to customize each chapter's title and description to ensure clarity and relevance for your audience.

items.question: How quickly can I generate chapterized videos?
items.answer: The generation process is fast, typically completed within minutes depending on the video length.

items.question: Is there a limit to how many chapters I can create?
items.answer: No, you can create as many chapters as needed for your video content!

items.question: What video formats are supported for uploading?
items.answer: We accept various formats including MP4, AVI, and MOV for seamless integration.

items.question: How does the pricing work for chapter generation?
items.answer: Our pricing is based on a pay-per-chapter model, allowing you to manage costs efficiently based on your needs.

items.question: Can I use chapter markers for live streams?
items.answer: Yes! You can create chapters for recorded live streams, making them more accessible for viewers post-broadcast.

items.question: Are there any commercial rights associated with generated videos?
items.answer: All videos processed through our platform come with full commercial rights for unrestricted use across all media.

items.question: What support resources are available for troubleshooting?
items.answer: We offer extensive support including documentation, video tutorials, and a dedicated support team to assist with any issues.

items.question: Is there an option for batch processing multiple videos?
items.answer: Yes, you can batch process multiple videos to streamline your content creation workflow.
